## getOccupiedNeighbors() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Get an array of all occupied hex coordinates that are neighboring a given coordinate.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getOccupiedNeighbors(board: GameBoard, coordinate: HexCoordinate): HexCoordinate[];
```

</td><td>

A game board.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

</td><td>

[HexCoordinate](./hive-lib.hexcoordinate.md)


</td><td>

The coordinate whose neighbors will be searched.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[HexCoordinate](./hive-lib.hexcoordinate.md)<!-- -->\[\]

An array of coordinates.
